message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. It's in excellent condition and worth every penny. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. I've done some research and I'm not sure the product is worth $14,000.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $11,000 is simply too low for me.  Let's meet in the middle - I'm willing to drop the price to $13,000.  This is still a fair price considering the value of the product.  What do you say?

I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $13,000. I'm thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.
